data.title: Death & Bereavement around Great Wyrley
data.meta_description: Death & Bereavement. GENERAL. FUNERALS. Great Wyrley Parish.
data.text:
Dedicated to parents who have suffered the loss of a baby through miscarriage, still birth or neonatal death. With a memorial page and advice.

The charity Cruse Bereavement Care helps and supports anyone bereaved by death. Cruse provides support and counselling and runs a confidential Help Line (Tel: 0870 167 1677). The website offers information on publications, events, and advice on bereavement

Free service for bereaved children, young people and their families in Warwickshire

Organization provides bereavement support, advice and literature to parents and families who have suffered the loss of a child. With links

Directory brings together details of the funeral homes, will writers and other services within a chosen region. Also find a guide to alternative burials.

National Association of Funeral Directors. Professional body offers advice on arranging a funeral and explains how funeral directors can serve the bereaved.

National Society of Allied & Independent Funeral Directors. Directory of this professional association's member companies. Also find a general guide to arranging a funeral.

Funeral guide for the UK includes a directory of funeral directors, undertakers and monumental masons
